title: I still have yet to find which skin I have gotten from a mystery gift.
body: I accidentally closed the box that revealed the skin to me and have tried to look for anything but have found no luck.

replies.body: I can't come out and tell you myself (because this could be personal info and I don't wanna give that out) but you can find the gifting history under your account's purchase history. Goto your accounts purchase history, then you can find Gifting History over on the left ^_^
